column4: Wait, if your card does 2d acceleration only, can it not use Beryl?
correct
what card do you have?
01:05.0 VGA compatible controller: ATI Technologies Inc ATI Radeon XPRESS 200M 5955 (PCIE)
you're not getting 3d acceleration with fglrx for some reason
is that a question or a statement? haha
a statement, that's why Xgl looks weird
and it's because my card doesn't have 3d acceleration? :-/
yes it does
it does? How did you find out?
because I have a lot of experience with that chip
I'm 100% sure it has 3d support
you are a god then =D
but only using fglrx
well i found a tutorial i think might help
http://www.howtoforge.com/ubuntu_feisty_beryl_ati_radeon
what do u think?
they recommend that i use the open source driver
no that's only for the free driver
it doesn't provide 3d acceleration on your card
you have to use the proprietary driver (fglrx)
ah i see
so can you help me diagnose the problem?
maybe, join #ubuntu-effects
